main event: On March 22-23, 1959, a civilian observer reported sighting a bright-white object in the sky over San Antonio, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as 3/4 the size of a grapefruit and approximately 1000 feet above ground,The object was reported to have a rocking effect while moving southeast,It was observed for 15 seconds,The weather was clear with good visibility at the time of the sighting,There is an indication of inconsistent data as the witness thought it resembled a disc moving at high speed.
sighted object: a bright-white object in the sky
